data.text:
Book #22072

What's to Become of the Boy? or Something to Do with Books - 1st US Edition/1st Printing

Heinrich Böll, Leila Vennnewitz

Binding: 1/4 Cloth

Book Condition: Fine in Fine dust jacket

Edition: 1st US Edition; First Printing

Publisher: New York: Alfred A. Knopf, 1984.

ISBN: 0394530160

What's to Become of the Boy? or Something to Do with Books - 1st US Edition/1st Printing

Heinrich Böll, Leila Vennnewitz

A most attractive first American edition/first printing in unread Fine condition in alike dust jacket.

The first autobiographical work of the German Nobel Prize winner, focusing on the crucial years of Böll's boyhood, 1933-1937, coinciding with Hitler's rise to power in Germany. Translated from the original German "Was soll aus dem Jungen bloss werden" by Leila Vennewitz; 12mo ; [x], 82, [4] pages.

Price: $60.00

Award Winner
